extensions.name: List View Example
extensions.description: Demonstrates how to use the List View with pagination.

extensions.name: Source View Example
extensions.description: Fetches Wikipedia pages to test source code highlighting.

extensions.name: Input Dialog Example
extensions.description: An example extension showing how to use input dialogs for user authentication.

extensions.name: Markdown View Example
extensions.description: An example extension showing how to create a markdown view.

extensions.name: Simple View Example
extensions.description: Demonstrates how to use the Simple View.

extensions.name: Settings View Example
extensions.description: Demonstrates how to use the Settings View.

extensions.name: Chat View Example
extensions.description: An example extension showing how to create a chat view with markdown support.

extensions.name: Browser View Example
extensions.description: Demonstrates how to use the Browser View.

extensions.name: Editor View Example
extensions.description: An example extension showing how to use the editor view.

extensions.name: Wikipedia Featured
extensions.description: Displays the Wikipedia featured article of the day.

extensions.name: Confirmation Dialog Example
extensions.description: An example extension showing how to use confirmation dialogs for notifications and confirmations.

extensions.name: Post View Example
extensions.description: An example extension showing how to create a post view.
